alert.note: Alert for Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Bear Lake Valley; Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Blackfoot Mountains; Challis, Pahsimeroi Valleys; Eastern Magic Valley; Franklin, Eastern Oneida Region; Lost River Range; Lost River Valleys; Lower Snake River Plain; Marsh and Arbon Highlands; Raft River Region; Shoshone, Lava Beds; Southern Hills, Albion Mountains; Teton Valley; Upper Snake River Plain; Wood River Foothills (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued April 03 at 3:44AM MDT until April 05 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph possible. * WHERE...Snake River Plain, Eastern Magic Valley, Raft River Region, Southern Hills/Albion Mountains, Bear River Range, Blackfoot Mountains, Teton Valley, Beaverhead/Lemhi Highlands, Pahsimeroi and Lost River Basins. * WHEN...From Monday afternoon through Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Areas of blowing dust could greatly reduce visibility, and may prompt temporary road closures--especially on Interstate 15 north of Idaho Falls and possibly on Interstate 84 around the Yale Interchange.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
